front.title: Redirecting Proxy Binding Updates in PMIPv6

abstract.t: This document specifies a new LMA Redirect mechanism, where aninitially contacted LMA can let the MAG know that it needs to connectto an alternate LMA to get mobility services, either for overloadprevention and/or load balancing purposes. This document proposes anew error code for the proxy binding acknowledgement message and anew mobility option to be carried on the binding acknowledgementmessage for this purpose.
